subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Mets’ relief corps did not allow a run in seven innings Thursday for the third consecutive game, taking over for a solid Nelson Figueroa, and not letting up through the 14th inning.
snippet: The Mets’ relief corps did not allow a run in seven innings Thursday for the third consecutive game, taking over for a solid Nelson Figueroa, and not letting up through the 14th inning.
